title: Creatures of the Storm
description: It never rains in Dos Hermanos, California…until the sky opens up and it will not stop. Suddenly 3,000 people are fighting for their lives against a massive flash flood. And then, on the first night, a thousand creatures — skinless, eyeless, all cutting edges and claws — come out of the storm to kill them all. Who will live? Who will die? And what is the secret hiding inside the Rain?
author: Brad Munson
